amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds with respect to military action in Syria to the extent that such action would be inconsistent with the War Powers Resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Radel amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Radel.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Radel amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
